    • Field Detail

      • appLogger

        private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger appLogger

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigCheck

        ConfigCheck()

    • Method Detail

      • checkConfig

        public static boolean checkConfig()
        Check the config file for configuration errors. If an error is found, the log file will tell the user where the error is, so they can fix their config.
        Returns:
        Return true if error is found in user's configuration. If an error is found, the application will exit in main.

      • isDir

        private static boolean isDir(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Checks whether the specified modpack exists. If it does, the config file is checked for errors. Should any error be found, it will return true so the configCheck method informs the user about an invalid configuration.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. Should an existing modpack be specified, all configurations are read from local file and the server pack is created, if config is correct.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if an error is found during configuration check. False if the configuration is deemed valid.

      • isCurse

        private static boolean isCurse()
        Checks whether the specified projectID,fileID combination is a valid CurseForge project and file and whether the resulting directory exists. If the directory does not exist, make calls to other methods which create the modpack. Parses information gathered from the modpack to later replace the previous configuration file.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Currently always returns true so ServerPackCreator does not go straight into server pack creation after the creation of the specified modpack. Gives the user the chance to check their config before actually creating the server pack.

      • containsFabric

        private static boolean containsFabric(Modpack modpack)
        Checks for the Jumploader mod in the project list of the modpack. If Jumploader is found, the modloader in the configuration will be set to Fabric.
        Parameters:
        modpack - Object. Contains information about our modpack. Used to get a list of all projects used in the modpack.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if Jumploader is found, false if not found.

      • suggestCopyDirs

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> suggestCopyDirs(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Creates a list of suggested directories to include in server pack which is later on written to a new configuration file.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The directory for which to gather a list of directories.
        Returns:
        List, String. Returns a list of directories inside the modpack, excluding well known client-side only directories which would not be needed by a server pack. If you have suggestions to this list, open an issue on https://github.com/Griefed/ServerPackCreator/issues

      • checkCurseForge

        static boolean checkCurseForge(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Checks whether the modpackDir contains a valid projectID,fileID combination. ProjectIDs must be at least two digits long, fileIDs must be at least 5 digits long. Must be numbers separated by a ",".
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The string which to check for a valid projectID,fileID combination.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the combination is deemed valid, false if not.

      • convertToBoolean

        private static boolean convertToBoolean(java.lang.String stringBoolean)
        Converts various strings to booleans.
        Parameters:
        stringBoolean - String. The string which should be converted to boolean if it matches certain patterns.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns the corresponding boolean if match with pattern was found. If no match is found, assume and return false.

      • printConfig

        static void printConfig(java.lang.String modpackDirectory,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientsideMods,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> copyDirectories,
                        boolean installServer,
                        java.lang.String javaInstallPath,
                        java.lang.String minecraftVer,
                        java.lang.String modloader,
                        java.lang.String modloaderVersion,
                        boolean includeIcon,
                        boolean includeProperties,
                        boolean includeScripts,
                        boolean includeZip)
        Prints the configuration.
        Parameters:
        modpackDirectory - String. Path to modpack directory.
        clientsideMods - String List. List of clientside mods to delete from server pack.
        copyDirectories - String List. List of directories to copy to server pack.
        installServer - Boolean. Whether to install the modloader server.
        javaInstallPath - String. Path to Java installation needed to install modloader server.
        minecraftVer - String. Minecraft version the modpack uses.
        modloader - String. Modloader the modpack uses.
        modloaderVersion - String. Version of the modloader the modpack uses.
        includeIcon - Boolean. Whether to include the server-icon.png in the server pack.
        includeProperties - Boolean. Whether to include the server.properties in the server pack.
        includeScripts - Boolean. Whether to include start scripts for the specified modloader in the server pack.
        includeZip - Boolean. Whether to create a zip-archive of the server pack.

      • checkModpackDir

        static boolean checkModpackDir(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Check whether the specified modpack directory exists.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The path to the modpack directory.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the directory exists. False if not.

      • checkCopyDirs

        static boolean checkCopyDirs(java.util.List<java.lang.String> copyDirs,
                             java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Check whether the specified directories exist in the modpack directory.
        Parameters:
        copyDirs - String. The directories for which to check.
        modpackDir - String. The path to the modpack directory in which to check for directories.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if all directories exist. False if any one does not.

      • getJavaPath

        static java.lang.String getJavaPath(java.lang.String enteredPath)
        Automatically set Java path if none is specified
        Parameters:
        enteredPath - String. The path to check whether it is empty.
        Returns:
        String. Return the entered Java path if it is not empty. Automatically determine path if empty.

      • checkJavaPath

        static boolean checkJavaPath(java.lang.String pathToJava)
        Checks whether the correct path to the Java installation was set.
        Parameters:
        pathToJava - String. The path to check for java.exe or java.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the path was correctly set. False if not.

      • checkModloader

        static boolean checkModloader(java.lang.String modloader)
        Checks whether Forge or Fabric were specified as modloader.
        Parameters:
        modloader - String. Check case insensitive for Forge or Fabric.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the specified modloader is either Forge or Fabric. False if not.

      • setModloader

        static java.lang.String setModloader(java.lang.String modloader)
        Standardize the specified modloader.
        Parameters:
        modloader - String. If any case of Forge or Fabric was specified, return "Forge" or "Fabric", so users can enter "forge" or "fabric" or any combination of upper- and lowercase letters..
        Returns:
        String. Returns a standardized String of the specified modloader.

      • checkModloaderVersion

        static boolean checkModloaderVersion(java.lang.String modloader,
                                     java.lang.String modloaderVersion)
        Determine whether to check for correct Forge or correct Fabric modloader version.
        Parameters:
        modloader - String. Determines whether the check for Forge or Fabric is called.
        modloaderVersion - String. The version of the modloader to check for.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the specified modloader version is correct. False if not.

      • isMinecraftVersionCorrect

        static boolean isMinecraftVersionCorrect(java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Check the specified Minecraft version against Mojang's version manifest to validate the version.
        Parameters:
        minecraftVersion - Minecraft version to check.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the specified Minecraft version could be found in Mojang's manifest. False if not.

      • isFabricVersionCorrect

        static boolean isFabricVersionCorrect(java.lang.String fabricVersion)
        Check the specified Fabric version against Fabric's version manifest to validate the version.
        Parameters:
        fabricVersion - String. The Fabric version to check.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the specified Fabric version could be found in Fabric's manifest. False if not.

      • isForgeVersionCorrect

        static boolean isForgeVersionCorrect(java.lang.String forgeVersion)
        Checks Forge version for errors (basically for its availability in Forge manifest)
        Parameters:
        forgeVersion - String. The Forge version to check.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if Forge version correct and false if it isn't correct.

      • latestFabricLoader

        private static java.lang.String latestFabricLoader(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Returns the latest installer version for the Fabric installer to be used in ServerSetup.installServer.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the Fabric installer will be placed in.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successful. False if not.

      • splitString

        private static java.lang.String[] splitString(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Splits a string into an array with the separator being ",". Used to get the CurseForge projectID and fileID as separate string so they can later be parsed into integers and used with the CurseForgeAPI make downloads and gather information.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The string which to split with the "," separator.
        Returns:
        Array, String. Returns the array consisting of the projectID at 0 and the fileID at 1.
